name: Magic Duels
summary: Magic Duels is the best way to start playing Magic, offering virtually unlimited free gameplay, regular content updates, unlockable cards, story-driven campaigns, and many exciting multiplayer modes. Play the world's best strategy game free on your favorite gaming device.
info:
• 中文名: 万智对决
  • 开发: Stainless Games
  • 发行: Wizards of the Coast
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2015年7月29日
  • 售价: Free
  • 官方网站: http://magic.wizards.com/en/content/magic-duels
